item.description:
Hey guys!

I went to see Improv Comedy at Improv Asylum and had a great time! I wanted to schedule a meetup for this so that we can all go together. It is very funny, and I am positive everyone will have a great time! If you have never seen improv before, then you should definitely attend. I've been to both Improv Boston in Central Square and Improv Asylum in North end, and I liked Improv Asylum better. Here s the link for their website:

http://www.improvasyl...

PLEASE BUY YOUR OWN TICKET!! It can be bought online. Buy the Main Show's ticket, for December 17th at 8PM.

We are going to watch the show, and then we can grab drinks later. If anyone knows a good bar around, then let me know! We will meet outside (or inside if its too cold!) the Improv Asylum.

Its easily accessible from the T (green line to Gov't center). It should be a great meetup!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside the venue. I'll pass my cellphone number later just in case.
item.name: Lets go to Improv Asylum!
